resources.string: Your payment was success.Our support team will call back soon!!
Your order was successfully inserted.Our support team will call back soon!!

ARTHI traders is operating in the field of distribution and supply of Veedol Lubricants, is a leading manufacturer and marketer of quality lubricants to satisfy automotive and industrial needs, founded by Mrs.Sridevi and Mr. Manikandan, who started their journey to make a sustainable and productive lubricant market in Dindigul. We have been catering to a massive retailer and consumer base for about 25 years and still going on. We offer door to door services and solutions for all your automotive needs by understanding your requirements. We also recommend and offer adaptive and quick industrial solution to cope up with your commercial needs. We serve in Dindigul, Theni and Sivaganga districts. A venture which ensures qualitative products at affordable prices.
